name: ui-router-menu-service
description: An AngularJS service to ease the menu styling when the routing changes, when using the ui-router.

scripts.clear-libs: if [ ! -d  libs ]; then mkdir -p  libs; elif [ "$(ls -A  libs)" ]; then rm libs/*; fi
scripts.build-libs: npm run clear-libs && npm run package-libs

author: Luc Sorel
